summary: Adds Dwarven Sorcery Armor which is animated.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][size=4]-Description -[/size][/u][size=4]
[/size][/b]
Adds Dwarven Sorcery Armor which is animated.

[color=#ff0000][size=4]Added new parts![color=#ff0000][size=4] (3/18/2018)
[/size][/color][/size][/color][size=2]You can choose either type.

[size=3][b]Type A[/b][/size]:

[/size][youtube]lHXcK9KaEfk[/youtube]


[size=3][b]Type B[/b]:[/size]

[youtube]XC4E9LnQzEg[/youtube]

[youtube]j4_0yI4RvgE[/youtube]

[youtube]Laj0R3HLEV8[/youtube]


[u][b][size=4]-Details-[/size][/b][/u]

This mod is incomplete. Please back up your save data.

There are enchanted version and normal version.
Normal version can be crafted in the smithy, requires Ancient Knowledge and Dwarven Smithing. Enchanted version will found in Avanchnzel.
Armor to be added is as follows. If you want to try, please use the console command.

-Dwarven Sorcery Armor ( Normal: XX005390, Enchanted: XX000D64 )
-Dwarven Sorcery Boots ( Normal: XX005391, Enchanted: XX000D6B )
-Dwarven Sorcery Gauntlets ( Normal: XX005392, Enchanted: XX000D67 )
-Dwarven Sorcery Helmet ( Normal: XX005393, Enchanted: XX000D6E )
-Dwarven Mechanical Eye ( Normal: XX005394, Enchanted: XX001DA4 )
-Dwarven Sorcery Shield ( Normal: XX005395, Enchanted: XX000D6D )


[u][b][size=4]-Known Issues-[/size][/b][/u]

-It does not support the weight.
-This has not been adjusted properly for female.
-Modeling so rough, animation might become strange.
-This Mod is using 53-60 of equipment slot. This mod conflicts with the mod that uses the same slot.
author: Mysteryman88

files.name: Dwarven Sorcery Armor Type A
files.changelogHtml:
0.3 - Added new parts.
0.2 - Fixed some bugs. Added a replacer version.
0.1 - Release.
